properties.Select_record: Select "_indextime" as indextime, "_raw" as raw, sourcetype as sourcetype, "_time" as timecolumn, "source" as source from flowfile

labels.label:
Manual Curl Command

[root@ip-172-31-13-238 ec2-user]# curl -k -u admin:$P@ssword https://ip-172-31-13-238.us-west-2.compute.internal:8089/services/auth/login -d username=admin -d password='$P@ssword'
